Strike.help: Claw Strike is a standard claw attack against a targeted foe.

Spin.help: Mako spins around with claws extended, slicing up all the nearby enemies.

Follow_Up.help: You perform a feint attack that deals moderate damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to Accuracy and damage for a brief time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Follow_Up.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} attack has increased you attack and damage for a short duration.

Eviscerate.help: Mako spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
Eviscerate.shortHelp: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special
Eviscerate.targetShortHelp: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special

Spirit_Shark.help: Projects an ethereal Spirit Shark that deals moderate damage and, possibly knocking down foes.

Circle_of_Sharks.help: The Circle of Sharks has Immobilized you, inflicting Energy Damage over Time.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Chum_Attack.help: The Chum Attack engulfs you in a wave of toxic sludge.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Quickness.help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow and confuse effects. You are also more evasive to melee, ranged and area of effect attacks.
Quickness.shortHelp: Auto: Self +Recharge, +SPD, +Perception, +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE) Res (Slow, Confuse)

Elude.help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased.

Bellow.help: Your Bellow is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Below deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary.
Bellow.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Hide.help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. Very low Endurance cost.

Placate.help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

Super_Leap.help: Mako can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.
